name: Above the Hill
description:
A horror game about a hicker who found himself in an uknown area with no map after falling down a mountain.
The player in this game must follow the path that should lead him to an abondoned house above the hill and there main the story will take place.
It is a first person horror game about a story of a familly that lived in a house far away from society, and what happend to that familly will be revealed in the game.
The player can interact with objects read letters and run away from enemies.
The game contains jumpscare and loud noises as well.
